Key Match Events: Ranger Suárez allowed six runs in two innings in a 9-1 loss to the Nationals.
Pre-Game Insights: Phillies manager Rob Thomson expressed confidence in Suárez's ability to perform in the playoffs, despite his recent struggles.
Post-Match Reflections: Suárez acknowledged that he hasn't been feeling his best due to a back injury, and hopes to turn the page and start fresh in the playoffs.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Suárez's recent struggles have been a concern for the Phillies, who hope he can flip a switch and return to form in the playoffs.
Others: Suárez's next start could be Game 4 of the National League Division Series, assuming Zack Wheeler, Aaron Nola, and Cristopher Sánchez start the first three games of the best-of-five series.
